work.title: Fellow, Data Reporter
work.desc: Run advanced data analyses in R and Python to develop promising leads and story ideas. File public records requests to gather data. Script, design and program graphics to supplement storytelling.

work.title: Data and Graphics Reporter
work.desc: Designed graphics and programmed interactive maps and visualizations. Built Python web scrapers to automate data collection. Created news apps and long-form web presentations to deliver data-driven stories in engaging ways.

work.title: Data Graphics Intern
work.desc: Pitched, reported and wrote data-driven stories. Analyzed data sets to develop story ideas. Built engaging charts, maps and graphics for stories to explain the news visually.
